            "_id": "67bbf201fab5f51a97fedca8",
            "documentPath": "projects/pmu-beauty-forms/databases/(default)/documents/form-templates/brow-lamination-eif73kf9",
            "documentId": "brow-lamination-eif73kf9",
            "id": "brow-lamination-eif73kf9",
            "order": 8,
            "sections": [
                {
                    "_id": "67f5081d8d72382b5d70af96",
                    "data": [
                        {
                            "line": "full",
                            "title": "Cleanse the entire brow area using the oil-free LACQUER BROW SHAMPOO.\n\nApply Lacquer Skin Barrier to the skin surrounding the eyebrows.",
                            "id": "paragraph1"
                        },
                        {
                            "line": "full",
                            "title": "If your client has very coarse hair, we have included LACQUER STYLING ADHESIVE to help set the coarse brows in place prior to applying LACQUER LIFT. Use a clean spoolie brush with each dip into the adhesive bottle. Roll the brow hairs upward to hold in place. Do not wipe off the adhesive. This will hold the brows in place for LACQUER LIFT solution. A little adhesive does the trick.",
                            "id": "paragraph2"
                        },
                        {
                            "line": "full",
                            "title": "*NOTE* Lacquer Styling Adhesive is NOT necessary for all clients. Use it sparingly and only for clients who have very coarse or stubborn hair. In most cases, styling adhesive is not necessary.",
                            "id": "paragraph3"
                        },
                        {
                            "line": "full",
                            "title": "LACQUER PRO TIP: Never double-dip into any products. Always use a new applicator when collection more product to prevent cross-contamination.",
                            "id": "paragraph4"
                        },
                        {
                            "line": "full",
                            "title": "Using a clean doe-foot applicator, apply Step 1, LACQUER LIFT in an upward direction, ensuring each hair is saturated.  Using the applicator, set each hair in the desired shape and direction. Be sure to focus the lotion on the root brushing in an upward direction.",
                            "id": "paragraph5"
                        },
                        {
                            "line": "full",
                            "title": "Carefully cover the brows with LACQUER BROW WRAP. When applying the brow wrap, be sure that every hair is lifted in the correct position from the root, and the plastic wrap is tight to the client's skin. If there is any bend or curl in the placement, the hair will set in that position.",
                            "id": "paragraph6"
                        },
                        {
                            "line": "full",
                            "title": "Set your timer for 3-5 minutes. (Very fine hair tends to lift by 4 minutes, while medium to coarse hair tends to lift by 5 minutes). After the appropriate time has passed, remove the plastic wrap and set it aside. With a dry Q-Tip, remove LACQUER LIFT and brush the brows upward. If the hair is NOT FLAT to the client's face, apply more product and cover the brows again for another 1-2 minutes.",
                            "id": "paragraph7"
                        },
                        {
                            "line": "full",
                            "title": "Processing times may vary from client to client. We do not recommend leaving the solutions on for more than 6.5 minutes. Step 1 and Step 2 should be processed for the same amount of time. Final processing time is at the discretion of the Lamination Technician. Our recommendations are guidelines but each client is different.",
                            "id": "paragraph8"
                        },
                        {
                            "line": "full",
                            "title": "Using a dry Q-Tip, wipe away step 1, LACQUER LIFT in the direction of hair growth. Roll the Q-Tip to collect the product.",
                            "id": "paragraph9"
                        },
                        {
                            "line": "full",
                            "title": "With a clean doe foot applicator, apply step 2, LACQUER LAMINATE to the entire brow brushing upwards. Cover with a new piece of brow wrap and set the timer.",
                            "id": "paragraph10"
                        },
                        {
                            "line": "full",
                            "title": "Use a slightly damp cotton round with LACQUER BROW SHAMPOO to thoroughly wipe away step 2, LACQUER LAMINATE",
                            "id": "paragraph11"
                        },
                        {
                            "line": "full",
                            "title": "* Optional * Tint the brows using professional eyebrow tint as per your previous training. Keep in mind the tint will activate much faster than usual. Check every 30 seconds.\n\n*We do not recommend performing both the lamination and tinting procedure on the same day. It’s best to wait a minimum of one week in between procedures to prevent overprocessing the hair. If you wish to tint on the same day, you may choose to do so at your own discretion. Keep in mind it’s important to assess the client’s brow hair condition and history prior to tinting.\n\nLamination and tinting should not be performed over hair which has been previously colored/tinting using color which contains metallic salts. If your client has previously tinted their brows, we recommend waiting a minimum of 2 weeks",
                            "id": "paragraph12"
                        },
                        {
                            "line": "full",
                            "title": "If you choose to tint, cleanse the brows one last time using a slightly damp cotton round and LACQUER BROW SHAMPOO after you have completed the tinting process.\n\nRemove any unwanted hair according to your waxing or threading training. If any adhesive residue is left on the skin, use step3, LACQUER SET, to gently massage the area and loosen up the adhesive, then wipe away.\n\nFinish the procedure by applying a thin layer of step 3, LACQUER SET. Style the brows with your spoolie brush and advise your client to leave LACQUER SET (which is a nourishing agent) on for the next 24-48 hours.\n\nSend your client home with LACQUER BROW BALM and aftercare instructions. They should use LACQUER BROW BALM daily to keep their new brows healthy and strong.",
                            "id": "paragraph13"
                        }
                    ],
                    "title": "Brow Lamination Procedure Guidelines and Aftercare"
                },
                {
                    "_id": "67f5081d8d72382b5d70af97",
                    "data": [
                        {
                            "line": "full",
                            "title": "• Do not wet your eyebrows for 24-48 hours\n• Avoid touching the brow area at the risk of transferring oils\n• Do not apply makeup to the brows for 24 hours post-treatment\n• Do not apply Retin A, aha or exfoliate the brow area for 72 hours before or after the treatment\n• No self-tanner products should be used on the face for at least 48 hours post-treatment\n• Apply Lacquer Brow Balm daily (we suggest before bed)\n• Comb the hairs into place each day",
                            "id": "after-care-list"
                        },
                        {
                            "line": "full",
                            "title": "Be sure to send your clients home with Lacquer Brow Balm to apply before bed to lengthen the results and condition their brows.\n\nWe are chemically treating the brow hairs so it is normal for the brows to feel slightly dry post-procedure. This is why the aftercare Lacquer Brow Balm is a must.",
                            "id": "after-care-1"
                        },
                        {
                            "line": "half",
                            "type": "checkbox",
                            "title": "I have read and understand the procedure guidelines and aftercare instructions",
                            "required": true,
                            "id": "agree-with-form"
                        }
                    ],
                    "title": "After Care",
                    "subtitle": "The aftercare is very simple when it comes to Brow Lamination. The most important points to relay to your clients are:"
                }
            ],
            "services": [
                17
            ],
            "tags": [],
            "title": "Brow Lamination Procedure Guidelines and Aftercare",
            "type": "care",

            "createdAt": "2020-11-30T22:55:00.000Z",
            "updatedAt": "2022-12-11T00:53:00.000Z",
            "__v": 0

            "order": 5,
            "sections": [
                {
                    "_id": "67f5081d8d72382b5d70af98",
                    "data": [
                        {
                            "line": "half",
                            "type": "checkbox",
                            "title": "Brow Lamination is a process of restructuring the brow hairs to keep them in the desired shape. The tint is an optional service. Brow Lamination lasts approx 4-8 weeks based on skin/hair type. Ideal clients: Spare brows, someone trying to grow out their eyebrow hair, all genders, unruly brows, coarse brows.",
                            "required": true,
                            "id": "brow-lamination-description"
                        },
                        {
                            "line": "half",
                            "type": "checkbox",
                            "title": "I understand Brow Lamination is a process of restructuring the brow hairs to keep them in a desired shape but it is your responsibility to brush your brows daily to the desired look. I understand I need to keep my brows dry for 48 hours. I will apply the balm nightly to help with brow strength and growth.",
                            "required": true,
                            "id": "brow-lamination-daily-brushing"
                        },
                        {
                            "title": "Please read the following information",
                            "id": null
                        },
                        {
                            "line": "half",
                            "title": "1. During the treatment, despite all precautionary measures, injury is possible. I will not hold the technician or business performing this service on me responsible in any way for any damages or issues that may arise as a result of having the Brow Lamination procedure performed on me.",
                            "id": "injury-possible"
                        },
                        {
                            "title": "2. Despite application of the most advanced and top ingredients, an allergic reaction is possible.",
                            "id": null
                        },
                        {
                            "title": "3. It is my responsibility to advise the technician of any concerns I may have before participating as a client and having this service performed on me, even though I may have written it down in this Release.",
                            "id": null
                        },
                        {
                            "title": "4. The minimum or maximum duration of the lamination from the procedure cannot be determined with certainty.",
                            "id": null
                        },
                        {
                            "title": "5. The technician and the business performing the service on me will not be liable for any damages caused to me or my eyebrows in any way caused by any reason, including allergic reaction, reaction to previous procedures such as previous henna/tint on the brow hair, skin sensitivity, and my failure to follow the Brow Lamination Aftercare Instructions. As part of the aftercare, apply a moisturizing product developed specifically for Brow Lamination to prolong the results.",
                            "id": null
                        },
                        {
                            "line": "half",
                            "type": "checkbox",
                            "title": "By checking here, you are waiving all rights and releasing {{user.businessName}} of any liabilities.",
                            "required": true,
                            "id": "no-liabilities"
                        }
                    ],
                    "title": "Brow Lamination Consent Form"
                }
            ],

            "_id": "67bbf203fab5f51a97feddc0",
            "documentPath": "projects/pmu-beauty-forms/databases/(default)/documents/form-templates/bbglow-understand-the-procedure-7f2c520",
            "documentId": "bbglow-understand-the-procedure-7f2c520",
            "id": "bbglow-understand-the-procedure-7f2c520",
            "order": 2,
            "sections": [
                {
                    "_id": "67f5081d8d72382b5d70af9b",
                    "data": [
                        {
                            "line": "full",
                            "title": "BB Glow treatment is a skin treatment that can assist in the reduction of the appearance of freckles and lightening of your skin. It also helps with skin discoloration caused by age spots, acne, and photo-aging.",
                            "id": "paragraph1"
                        }
                    ],
                    "title": "What is BB Glow?"
                },
                {
                    "_id": "67f5081d8d72382b5d70af9c",
                    "data": [
                        {
                            "line": "full",
                            "title": "BB Glow sessions can range from a few to multiple sessions. In most cases, the effect can be seen in a short period of time. This is why BB Glow treatment is a great option for events and special occasions.",
                            "id": "paragraph2"
                        }
                    ],
                    "title": "How Many Treatments?"
                },
                {
                    "_id": "67f5081d8d72382b5d70af9d",
                    "data": [
                        {
                            "line": "full",
                            "title": "The BB Glow treatment will begin restoring even skin tone and a radiant complexion. This is a great way to get an instant and gradual lightning effect. As the melanin content in the skin is reduced, there is lesser discoloration too.",
                            "id": "paragraph3"
                        }
                    ],
                    "title": "Post Treatment"
                },
                {
                    "_id": "67f5081d8d72382b5d70af9e",
                    "data": [
                        {
                            "line": "full",
                            "title": "Surprisingly no! The needles in the tool are so small, and the micro-tears are so shallow in your skin, that you don't feel much at all. Of course, pain tolerance levels vary from person to person, but most patients will feel very little pain at all.",
                            "id": "paragraph4"
                        }
                    ],
                    "title": "Does It Hurt?"
                },
                {
                    "_id": "67f5081d8d72382b5d70af9f",
                    "data": [
                        {
                            "line": "half",
                            "type": "checkbox",
                            "title": "I have read and understand the BB Glow procedure",
                            "required": true,
                            "id": "agree-with-form"
                        }
                    ],
                    "title": "Agreement"
                }
            ],
            "services": [
                12
            ],

            "title": "Understand the BB Glow Procedure",

        {
            "isDeleted": false,
            "_id": "67bbf203fab5f51a97feddd2",
            "documentPath": "projects/pmu-beauty-forms/databases/(default)/documents/form-templates/bb-bglow-consent-pqc930s8",
            "documentId": "bb-bglow-consent-pqc930s8",
            "id": "bb-bglow-consent-pqc930s8",
            "order": 5,
            "sections": [
                {
                    "_id": "67f5081d8d72382b5d70afa0",
                    "data": [
                        {
                            "line": "half",
                            "type": "checkbox",
                            "title": "I understand that BB Glow is a beauty therapy treatment using a micro-needling device. This procedure is based on the skin’s natural ability to repair itself. Micro-needling treatments create superficial “micro-channels” to the outermost layer of the skin which promotes new collagen production during the healing process. Micro-needling has been shown to reduce the visibility of acne scars, fine lines, and wrinkles, diminish hyperpigmentation, and improve skin tone and texture.",
                            "required": true,
                            "id": "beauty-therapy-micro-needling"
                        },
                        {
                            "line": "half",
                            "type": "checkbox",
                            "title": "BB Glow is a combination of a powerful tinted serum applied using this micro-needling method - а іntеnѕіvе ѕkіn treatment thаt uѕеѕ ѕtаtе-оf-thе-аrt tесhnоlоgу to реnеtrаtе the skins first 5 lауеrѕ of the epidermis, with microneedles which are rapidly released from a micro-needling pen. One of the main benefits of basic micro-needling is stimulation of natural соllаgеn production and skin rejuvenation, where the BB Glow peptide serums adds incredible nutrients and most importantly adding the tint color you desire.",
                            "required": true,
                            "id": "beauty-therapy-micro-needling"
                        },
                        {
                            "line": "half",
                            "type": "checkbox",
                            "title": "I hereby authorize and direct {{user.businessName}} to perform my BB Glow micro-needling treatment. ",
                            "required": true,
                            "id": "side-effects"
                        },
                        {
                            "line": "half",
                            "type": "checkbox",
                            "title": "I understand the possible side effects included and are not limited to: slight or extreme redness, histamine reaction, swelling, stinging itchy, tender, dry or flaking skin. In rare instances, hyperpigmentation/hypopigmentation, scarring, or infection can occur.",
                            "required": true,
                            "id": "side-effects"
                        },
                        {
                            "line": "half",
                            "type": "checkbox",
                            "title": "I UNDERSTAND THAT I SHOULD ONLY APPLY PRODUCTS RECOMMENDED BY MY SKIN THERAPIST POST TREATMENT.",
                            "required": true,
                            "id": "only-recommended-products"
                        },
                        {
                            "line": "half",
                            "title": "I understand that using other skincare or taking part in the following can alter the effect of the BB Glow Treatment. The following procedures need to be stopped while being treated, laser skin surface treatments, chemical peels, microdermabrasion, and invasive facial treatments. Other options not mentioned here may exist. Risk and potential complications are associated with alternative treatments.\n\nMost side effects will gradually diminish over time as healing may take several days. Notify your doctor if any side effects cause extreme discomfort or any unexpected problems occur immediately.",
                            "type": "checkbox",
                            "required": true,
                            "id": "other-products-negative-effects"
                        },
                        {
                            "line": "half",
                            "title": "I have avoided the following products/procedures 2 WEEKS prior to treatment:\n• Topical prescriptions including but not limited to Retin-A, Tretinoin, Differin, Tazorac\n• Abrasive scrubs or other exfoliating products\n• Laser treatment\n• Botox or any other filler",
                            "type": "checkbox",
                            "id": "avoid-procedures-two-weeks"
                        },
                        {
                            "line": "half",
                            "title": "I have not had any cosmetic injections within the last TWO WEEKS",
                            "type": "checkbox",
                            "id": "no-cosmetic-injections-two-weeks"
                        },
                        {
                            "line": "full",
                            "title": "Notify your Skin Therapist PRIOR TO SIGNING THIS CONSENT if any of the following apply to you:",
                            "id": "pre-conditions"
                        },
                        {

                            "type": "checkbox",
                            "title": "Diabetes",
                            "id": "diabetes"

                {
                    "_id": "67f5081d8d72382b5d70afa1",
                    "data": [
                        {
                            "line": "half",
                            "title": "I hereby authorize {{user.businessName}} to perform upon myself permanent cosmetic enhancement.  If any unforeseen condition arises in the course of the procedure(s) I further request and authorize her to use her full judgement and do whatever he/she deems advisable and necessary in the circumstances.",
                            "type": "checkbox",
                            "required": true,
                            "id": "authorize-permanent-cosmetic-enhancement"
                        },
                        {
                            "line": "half",
                            "type": "checkbox",
                            "title": "I understand that permanent cosmetic enhancement is an advanced form of tattooing. Tattoo(s) should be considered permanent; that it can only be removed with a surgical procedure; and that any effective removal may leave permanent scarring and disfigurement. I accept responsibility for determining the color, shape and position of the enhancement as agreed during the course of my consultation.",
                            "required": true,
                            "id": "advanced-tattooing"
                        },
                        {
                            "line": "half",
                            "title": "I understand that permanent cosmetics are permanent and that if I choose to have them removed, it may be expensive and leave scars.",
                            "type": "checkbox",
                            "required": true,
                            "id": "permanent-cosmetics-permanent"
                        },
                        {
                            "line": "half",
                            "title": "I understand that a sensitivity test for pigment does not guarantee that I will not have an allergic response.  I am aware of that allergic response to pigment is rare and accept all responsibility if allergic response occurs.  I am aware that a sensitivity reaction to anesthetics can occur and accept all responsibility if allergic response occurs.  I fully understand and accept that non-toxic pigments are used during the procedure and that the cosmetic enhancement achieved may fade over the course of 1-3 years.  even though the color has faded, the pigment will stay in the skin indefinitely and may leave a light residue of color.  I understand that dyes, inks and pigments are not approved by the Food and Drug Administration (FDA) and the health effects are not known.  I accept that the highest standards of hygiene are met, and that sterile disposable needles are used for each individual client, procedure and visit.",
                            "type": "checkbox",
                            "required": true,
                            "id": "accept-sensitivity-test"
                        },
                        {
                            "line": "half",
                            "type": "checkbox",
                            "title": "I understand and accept that each procedure is a process requiring multiple applications of pigment to achieve desirable results, and that 100% success cannot be guaranteed.  I understand that this is why I need to return for a touch-up procedure that is not included in the initial price.  I understand that the pigment may migrate under the skin, however this is a rare occurrence.  I understand that permanent cosmetic enhancement is an invasive procedure and the infusion process can be uncomfortable.",
                            "required": true,
                            "id": "accept-multiple-pigment-applications"
                        },
                        {
                            "line": "half",
                            "type": "checkbox",
                            "title": "I understand that the touch-up procedure, if required, will be performed 1-3 months after the initial procedure and that after a 3-month period I will be charged an additional fee for any procedures.  I understand that a touch-up procedure takes place 3-4 weeks after the initial application to allow the procedure site to fully heal.  I will book the appointment when it is convenient for both parties.",
                            "required": true,
                            "id": "control-procedure"
                        },
                        {
                            "line": "half",
                            "title": "I understand that loss of any eyelashes during the healing of permanent cosmetic eye enhancements will result in new eyelash growth over a 4 month period and that eyelash loss is rare and minimal.  I understand that in rare cases that corneal abrasion can occur during eyeliner procedures.",
                            "type": "checkbox",
                            "required": true,
                            "id": "loss-eyelashes"
                        },
                        {
                            "line": "half",
                            "title": "I am aware that the result of the procedure is determined by the following: Medication, Skin Characteristics - i.e. dry/oily/sun-damaged, Natural skin undertones, Alcohol intake and smoking, General stress, A compromised immune system, Poor diet, Post procedure care treatment.",
                            "type": "checkbox",
                            "required": true,
                            "id": "procedure-result"
                        },
                        {
                            "line": "half",
                            "title": "I have been advised that upon completion of the procedure there may be swelling and redness of the skin, which will subside within 1-4 days dependent on lifestyle.  In some cases bruising can occur.",
                            "type": "checkbox",
                            "required": true,
                            "id": "completion-swelling-redness"
                        }
                    ],
                    "title": "Permanent Makeup Consent and Procedure Permit"
                }

            "_id": "67bbf205fab5f51a97fee414",
            "documentPath": "projects/pmu-beauty-forms/databases/(default)/documents/form-templates/8700cf0",

            "sections": [
                {
                    "_id": "67f5081d8d72382b5d70afa2",
                    "data": [
                        {
                            "line": "half",
                            "type": "checkbox",
                            "title": "Pain: There can be pain even after the topical anesthetic has been used.  Anesthetics work better on some people than on others.",
                            "required": true,
                            "id": "pain"
                        },
                        {
                            "line": "half",
                            "title": "Infection: Infection is very unusual.  The areas treated must be kept clean, and only freshly cleaned hands should touch the areas.  See 'After Care' sheet for instruction on care.",
                            "type": "checkbox",
                            "required": true,
                            "id": "infection"
                        },
                        {
                            "line": "half",
                            "title": "Uneven Pigmentation: This can result from poor healing, infection, bleeding, or many other causes.  Your follow-up appointment will likely correct any uneven appearance.",
                            "type": "checkbox",
                            "required": true,
                            "id": "uneven-pigmentation"
                        },
                        {
                            "line": "half",
                            "title": "Asymmetry: Evey effort will be made to avoid asymmetry, but our faces are not symmetrical so ADJUSTMENTS MAY BE NEEDED DURING THE FOLLOW-UP SESSION TO CORRECT ANY UNEVENNESS.",
                            "type": "checkbox",
                            "required": true,
                            "id": "asymmetry"
                        },
                        {
                            "line": "half",
                            "title": "Excessive Swelling or Bruising: Some people bruise or swell more than others.  Ice packs may help reduce the swelling.  The swelling or bruising typically disappears in 1-5 days.  Some people don't bruise or swell at all",
                            "type": "checkbox",
                            "required": true,
                            "id": "excessive-swelling"
                        },
                        {
                            "line": "half",
                            "title": "Anesthetics: Topical anesthetics are used to numb the area to be tattooed.  Lidocaine, Prilocaine, Benzocaine, Tetracaine, and/or Epinephrine cream and/or liquid are used.  If you are allergic to any of these, please inform me now.",
                            "type": "checkbox",
                            "required": true,
                            "id": "anesthetics"
                        },
                        {
                            "line": "half",
                            "type": "checkbox",
                            "title": "MRI: Because pigments used in Permanent Cosmetic procedures contain inert oxides, a low level magnet may be required if you need to be scanned by an MRI machine.  You must inform your MRI Technician of any tattoos or permanent cosmetics.",
                            "required": true,
                            "id": "mri"
                        },
                        {
                            "line": "full",
                            "title": "The alternative to these possibilities is to use traditional cosmetics and NOT undergo the Permanent Eyebrow procedure.",
                            "id": "alternative-header"
                        },
                        {
                            "line": "full",
                            "title": "I certify that I have read or have had to me the contents of this form.  I understand the risks, and alternatives involved in this procedure(s).  I have had the opportunity to ask questions, and all of my questions have been answered.  I acknowledge that I have reviewed and approved the material given to me, and I authorize ({{user.businessName}}), as my eyebrow microblading technician to perform on my body the Microblading/3D Eyebrow Embroidery procedure desired today.",
                            "id": "certify-paragraph"
                        },
                        {
                            "line": "full",
                            "type": "textfield",
                            "title": "Signature",
                            "required": true,
                            "id": "signature"
                        },
                        {

                            "type": "date",
                            "title": "Date",
                            "required": true,
                            "id": "date"
                        }
                    ],

                }
